meanings.definition: A knitted garment worn on the upper body to keep warm.
meanings.sent1: During winter, I always wear sweaters to stay cozy.
meanings.sent2: She bought new sweaters for the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The colorful sweaters made the fashion show more vibrant.
meanings.sent4: Her love for sweaters was like a hug from a friend.
meanings.sent5: The softness of the sweaters felt like a warm embrace.

meanings.sent1: I will sweaters before going outside.
meanings.sent2: He sweaters quickly before heading out.
meanings.sent3: She always sweaters in a rush, forgetting her scarf.
meanings.sent4: Sweatering up, he braved the chilly wind.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to sweaters before leaving the house.

meanings.sent1: After the workout, the sweaters were dripping with sweat.
meanings.sent2: The sweaters in the gym were working hard.
meanings.sent3: The sweaters at the sauna enjoyed the heat.
meanings.sent4: The sweaters in the race were determined to win.
meanings.sent5: The sweaters in the sun felt the moisture on their skin.
